channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s how much today’s 65-year-olds will spend on healthcare in retirement
item.description: Ready for some ‘sticker shock?’ Retiree healthcare expenses keep rising.

item.description: Visa is seeing “resilient” trends in discretionary and non-discretionary spending categories.
